title: Sins of Colonialism - Collection 18 (.. in Africa 4)
description:
Sins of Colonialism - Collection 18 (.. in Africa 4):

We have 34 titles here:

-  Alexander et al (Eds.) - The Algerian War and the French Army, 1954-62; Experiences, Images, Testimonies (2002)

-  Amnesty Int. - Chains of Abuse; the Global Diamond Supply Chain and the Case of the Central African Republic (2015)

-  Amutabi & Nasong'o (Eds.) - Regime Change and Succession Politics in Africa; Five Decades of Misrule (2013)

-  Anderson - Histories of the Hanged; the Dirty War in Kenya and the End of Empire (2005)

-  Barthorp - The Anglo-Boer Wars; the British and the Africkaners, 1815-1902 (1987)

-  Byfield et al (Eds.) - Africa and World War II (2015)

-  Camus - Algerian Chronicles (2013)

-  Carney - Rwanda before the Genocide; Catholic Politics and Ethnic Discourse in the Late Colonial Era (2014)

-  Conrad - German Colonialism; a Short History (2012)

-  Echenberg - Africa in the Time of Cholera; a History of Pandemics from 1817 to the Present (2011)

-  Edwards - Toxic Aid; Economic Collapse and Recovery in Tanzania (2014)

-  Evans - Encyclopedia of the Boer War (2000)

-  Gardner - Taxing Colonial Africa; the Political Economy of British Imperialism (2012)

-  Greaves - Forgotten Battles of the Zulu War (2012)

-  Jones - Mutiny on the Amistad (1987)

-  Keown-Boyd - A Good Dusting; the Sudan Campaigns, 1883-1899 (1986)

-  Kerr - A Short History of Africa; From the Origins of the Human Race to the Arab Spring (2011)

-  King - From Classrooms to Conflict in Rwanda (2014)

-  Kokorev & Reznikovsky - Southern Africa; the Essence of the Conflict (1988)

-  Krebs - Gender, Race, and the Writing of Empire; Public Discourse and the Boer War (2004)

-  Lapansky-Werner & Bacon (Eds.) - Back to Africa; Benjamin Coates and the Colonization Movement in America, 1848-1880 (2005)

-  Melber - Understanding Namibia; the Trials of Independence (2014)

-  Peers - The African Wars; Warriors and Soldiers of the Colonial Campaigns (2010)

-  Posel - The Making of Apartheid, 1948-1961; Conflict and Compromise (1991)

-  Ray et al (Eds.) - Dirty Work 2; the CIA in Africa (1980)

-  Richard (Ed.) - Materializing Colonial Encounters; Archaeologies of African Experience (2015)

-  Stephens - Fuelling the Empire; South Africa's Gold and the Road to War (2003)

-  The English Purchase of the Danish Possessions in the East Indies and Africa, 1845 and 1850

-  Thomas - Africa and France; Postcolonial Cultures, Migration, and Racism (2013)

-  Turse - Tomorrow's Battlefield; US Proxy Wars and Secret Ops in Africa (2015)

-  van Hartesveldt - The Boer War; Historiography and Annotated Bibliography (2000)

-  Wrong - I Didn't Do It for You; How the World Betrayed a Small African Nation (2005)

-  Wrong - In the Footsteps of Mr. Kurtz; Living on the Brink of Disaster in Mobutu's Congo (2001)

-  Wrong - It's Our Turn to Eat; the Story of a Kenyan Whistle-Blower (2009)
